user_query: I want to surprise my husband with tickets to an NBA game. Can you provide me with the schedule of all the games in our city for the month of September? Additionally, give me some interesting facts about the year 1985 and a random Chuck Norris joke to make him laugh.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the NBA game schedule for all games in the user's city for the month of September.
Collect interesting facts about the year 1985.
Fetch a random Chuck Norris joke.
